Title: KS Skeleton Dial Vintage Pendant Unisex Steel Mechanical Fob Pocket Watch + C...
Description: KS Skeleton Dial Vintage Pendant Unisex Steel Mechanical Fob Pocket Watch + Chain KSP004 Present by Kronen & Sohne group, Heidelberg series. 17 Jewels Hand Winding mechanical movement. Case diameter: 4.7cm (1.9 inch) approx. Case thickness: 1.4cm approx (0.6inch), cover included. Chain Length: 34cm (13.4inch) approx. (hook included). Package Included: 1 x Genuine "Kronen & Sohne" pocket watch. 1 x Limited edition key style pendant. 1 x Gift Box. 1 x International Warranty Card A hand-wound mechanical watch is powered by winding the crown to wind up the mainspring within the movement. Therefore, it is necessary to wind them up regularly using the crown, usually once a day. About Hand-Wound Mechanical Watches: A hand-wound mechanical watch is powered by winding the crown to wind up the mainspring within the movement. Therefore, it is necessary to wind them up regularly using the crown, usually once a day. Also, be careful not to overwind the watch. You should stop winding when you feel resistance. This resistance indicates that the spring has reached its maximum tension. Overwinding will ultimately break the spring. As the prophase of Kronen & Sohne pocket watch issue, an elegant limited edition key style pendant will be sent with our pocket watch, as a honoraria for supporting Kronen & Sohne group so many years. Main Features: - Present by Kronen & Sohne group, Heidelberg series. - Designed by renowned German Watch Maker "Mr. Ludwig van der Waals". - Precision Movement with the latest breakthrough "Kronen & Sohne" Patented Mechanical Technology. - 17 Jewels Hand Winding mechanical movement. - High quality copper case and strap. - 12 months International Guarantee. Specification (approximate) - Case diameter: 4.7cm (1. 9 inch) approx. - Case thickness: 1.4cm approx (0. 6inch), cover included. - Case Material: copper. - Chain Length: 34cm (13.4inch) approx. (hook included). - Chain Material: copper. Return Locations - Please be informed that our products are being stored and fulfilled by third party warehouses and manufacturers throughout the United States (also known as third party fulfillment or product sourcing).
